ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( FolioResume__c = "FN" || FolioResume__c = "FI" || FolioResume__c = "PT", ISPICKVAL( Quotation_Status__c , "Approved as Succesful"), ISNULL( Origin_Location__Latitude__s ), ISNULL( Origin_Location__Longitude__s ), ISNULL( Destination_Location__Latitude__s ), ISNULL( Destination_Location__Longitude__s ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Los campos de origin location y destination location no pueden estar vac√≠os.
